resources.string: I recently started my work as a software engineer in one of Divar\'s sub companies (Pishgaman). I develop review and anti-fraud tools to make Divar a safer market.
Balad has a great path finding service and I mostly worked on this service. It\'s the core of Balad and responds to more than 1000 requests sper second.
Tapsell has one the largest ad networks in Iran. I lead a team to develop ad processing and suggesting service for Digikala.
